sentences.sContent: She was afraid that if she spoke up her colleagues would ostracize her.
sentences.sCn: 她担心，如果她说出来，同事们就会孤立她。

sentences.sContent: He was ostracized by the other students.
sentences.sCn: 他受到其他学生的排斥。

synos.tran: 放逐；排斥；按贝壳流放法放逐

remMethod.val: ostrac(贝壳) + ize → 用投贝壳的方法决定是否放逐某人 → 放逐

words.tran: （古希腊）贝壳放逐法；排斥（等于ostracize）

trans.tranOther: if a group of people ostracize someone, they refuse to accept them as a member of the group
